node.name: Acoustic foam soundproofing tile MAKE: SILENCE ACOUSTIC
node.description: Durable, maintenance free, polyurethane acoustic foam which absorbs sound by 30-40dB and also application area is higher at lower cost per Sqfeet. Applied in any surface, walls or doors, a perfect soundproof item for solo performers and employees working from home. (50dB = Rainfall / 120dB = Rock concert / 150dB = Rock music at peak) (SIZE: 2feet x 2feet x 2inch / WEIGHT: 75 gram per tile / RATE: Rs.134 per Sqfeet / COLOR: Charcoal Black / NUMBER OF TILES: 8)
node.content:
1. It’s a DIY(Do it Yourself) product that absorbs 60% of echo in close premises like a home office or recording studio or rooms that have only one outer wall.
2. Each package contains 8 Pcs of 2feet x 2feet tile which covers a net area of 32 Sqfeet, which means less fixing accessories or less working time needed to cover an area. 
3. Made with medium density(100 Kg/CubicMeter) polyurethane foam which enables good workability at uneven shapes, also easy to fix at any aligned surface. 
4. NRC(Noise Reduction Coefficient) of this acoustic foam is greater than .90 hence it absorbs 90% of vibration generated by impacted sound(Kindly, note that we are talking about vibration and not energy, Sound is a form of energy).
5. STC(Sound transmission class or Sound reduction index) is also greater than 40dB, which means if we place this foam in the interior partition wall and create 100dB(too loud to hear) sound in one room then it cuts the 40dB sound from it and passes only 60dB sound to an adjacent room.
node.alt: Silence Acoustic® Wedge Soundproofing acoustic foam 2'x2',2inches (Set of 8) (Black)

node.name: Acoustic turbo soundproofing tile MAKE: YGM ACOUSTIC
node.description: Grooved, light weight and high-density polyurethane material is used to completely absorb the sound energy while also provide excellent interior architectural significance. Per Sqfeet cost is high due to dual nature of application but requirement of adhesive is less. (90dB = Hearing loss for exposure of ear more than 1 hour / 140dB = Permanent damage for exposure for ear more than 20 minutes / 180dB = Death of hearing tissue) (SIZE: 1feet x 1feet x 2inch / WEIGHT: 40 gram per tile / RATE: Rs.620 per Sqfeet / COLOR: Charcoal Black / NUMBER OF TILES: 12)
node.content:
1. Smart design by economical point of view as the projected grooves help to lightweight the tiles and also one can easily fit the LED lightning on the groove for alluring view. 
2. For the non-symmetrical area where there is a need to cut the acoustic tile, it is quite easy to slit from the grooves.
3. In one pack total of 12 Sqfeet of the area has been covered and it is suggested that do not place all the tiles in one wall, 3 tiles in every one wall of the four-sided close room at a height between 3 feet to 6 feet.
4. NRC(Noise Reduction Coefficient) of this acoustic foam is greater than 1.00 hence it absorbs 100% of vibration generated by impacted sound(Kindly, note that we are talking about vibration and not energy, a Sound is a form of energy).
5. Surface area of this groove tile is greater than a pyramid or wedge design and therefore STC(Sound transmission class or Sound reduction index) is also greater than 33dB.
6. Highly recommended for employees who work from home.
node.alt: YGM Acoustic Foams® (Set of 48) Turbo Soundproofing Studio Acoustic Foam 1'x1' Charcoal Grey

node.name: Acoustic foam soundproofing tile MAKE: MMT ACOUSTIX
node.description: Cheapest polyurethane material that is molded in cluster shape of 1 inch high pyramid and tile size of 1 feet length and 1 feet width. It absorb only vibrations of sound and give best output with additional layer of mineral wool.(20dB = Ticking watch / 110dB = Screaming child / 140dB = Gunfire) (SIZE: 1feet x 1feet x 1 inch / WEIGHT: 35 gram per tile / RATE: Rs.149.5 per Sqfeet / COLOR: Charcoal Black / NUMBER OF TILES: 9)
node.content:
1. A major misconception, that sound absorption is the same as soundproofing and literally sound absorption is just a part like this acoustic foam that engulfs sound vibrations. 
2. Choosing a pyramid shape is to increase the surface area so that maximum vibration of sound can get be absorbed.
3. NRC(Noise Reduction Coefficient) of this acoustic foam is greater than .65 hence it absorbs 65% of vibration generated by impacted sound(Kindly, note that we are talking about vibration and not energy, a Sound is a form of energy).
4. Well, 9 tiles of size 1feet x 1feet comes in one package, do not place all the tiles in one wall, two tiles in every one wall of the four-sided close room at a height between 3 feet to 6 feet.
5. STC(Sound transmission class / Sound reduction index) is also greater than 32dB, which means if we place this foam in the interior partition wall and create 100dB(too loud to hear) sound in one room then it cuts the 32dB sound from it and passes only 68dB sound to an adjacent room.
node.alt: MMT Acoustix® 1x1 ft, 1" Pyramid Soundproofing Acoustic Foam (Professional Charcoal) - Set of 9

node.name: Acoustic Wedge sponge soundproofing tile MAKE: HONEYTECS
node.description: Balanced mass and flexibility while property to convert sound energy into heat energy, this sponge is ideal sound absorbing and heat insulation material. Sponge has 3mm of acoustiblok isolation membrane which makes it semi-polyurethane foam. (80dB = Busy street / 130dB = Jackhammer / 170dB = Rocket lift off) (SIZE: 1feet x 1feet x 1inch / WEIGHT: 30 gram per tile / RATE: Rs.520 per Sqfeet / COLOR: Red+Black / NUMBER OF TILES: 12)
node.content:
1. Although the application rate of this semi-polyurethane foam is high its quality to absorb the sound of any level makes a major difference.
2. 3mm acoustiblok membrane works by converting a more problematic acoustic energy into less problematic heat energy which is simply transferred through the polyurethane foam to reduce flanking transmissions. 
3. Apart from sound absorption, the Red+Black color tile has an advantage from the decorative point of view as well.
4. Approved by ARAI(Automotive Research Association of India) on various aspects other than NRC & STC(as per regular ones) values.
5. Just because of CAC(Ceiling Attenuation Class) value equals 35, its application is also done on the ceiling for sound absorption at small offices.
6. In Case of noisy neighbors or one should want to soundproof the bedroom of the his-her apartment, this item fills in for the job.
node.alt: Honeytecs Recording Studio Soundproof Wedge Foam Video Room Sound Noise Insulation Sponge Wall Deadening
